original_text: They went up against the Benjamites on the third day and took up positions against Gibeah as they had done before.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 셋째 날에 베냐민 자손을 치러 올라가서 전과 같이 기브아에 맞서 전열을 갖추매

sentences.original_text: They went up against the Benjamites
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 베냐민 사람들과 맞서 싸우러 올라갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and took up positions against Gibeah
